Serialized Form

  • Package ui

    • Class ui.GamePanel

      class GamePanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • animationFrames
          int animationFrames
          Number of frames for animating blocks disappearing.
        • animationState
          int animationState
          State variable counts down to zero while animating the cells to be collapsed.
        • blocksToCollapse
          List<Position> blocksToCollapse
          When the IGame object is in the COLLAPSING state, this field stores the the cells to be collapsed in the next step. This value can be used to apply special rendering or animation to the collapsing cells. An invariant is maintained that this variable is non-null if and only if the IGame state is COLLAPSING.
        • fastDrop
          boolean fastDrop
          State variable indicating when the timer frequency is increased for dropping a polyomino to the bottom of the grid.
        • game
          Game game
          The IGame instance for which this is the UI.
        • level
          PlayLevel level
          The difficulty level of the game, which determines the speed of the animation.
        • paused
          boolean paused
        • previewPanel
          PreviewPanel previewPanel
          Preview panel associated with the game.
        • scorePanel
          ScorePanel scorePanel
          Score panel associated with the game.
        • timer
          Timer timer
          The javax.swing.Timer instance used to animate the UI.

      class PreviewPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • nextPiece
          Piece nextPiece

    • Class ui.ScorePanel

      class ScorePanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • score
          int score
          Score to be displayed.
